name: Ecosource
overview:
Overview Ecosource solutions, inc is a web-based marketplace that connects facility managers, contractors and the facility supplies they use. This marketplace allows facility managers to manage facility supplies, service contracts, Broad cast RFP’s(request for proposals), negotiate service terms and market their properties for lease or sale from a single intuitive web based system. For commercial contactors (ex. Janitorial, plumbing, air conditioning, landscaping) it provides a simple platform for them to create and manage customized estimates/proposals for facility managers, manage supplies , service contracts, Invoices , payments and work orders. Our solution merges industry standard work flows in order to create a simple and seamless system for facility services lifecycle (quotations to service agreements/contracts to work orders to invoices and finally payment). For property managers, this result in greater efficiency, cost savings, and allows them to utilize and create their own service ecosystem of small local contractors without being burden administratively.

Benefits

Contractors

  1. Ability to manage all aspects of their business from the web with PC or Mobile tablet.
  2. Ability to bid for projects and contracts posted by property managers using same work flow used to create quotes for regular offline customers.
  3. Ability to accept payments online without having a merchant number.
  4. Increase sales from ecobucks (rebates) given to property managers to pay for services when they buy eco friendly supplies.
  5. Green certification test based on LEED Standards that helps to promote contractors as a sustainable company.

Property Manager

  1. Ability to market vacant and for sale facilities to members of ecosource and on major search engines.
  2. Manage RFP’s , negotiate terms , and create service agreements for free using our simple web-based platform.
  3. Manage supply purchases for multiple facilities and create customize supply lists for each facility.
  4. Pay Invoices and online and apply ecobucks ( rebates for buying eco-friendly supplies) to invoices to reduce service costs.
  5. Manage their website content and listings on from our ecosource panel.
